Voice Controlled Wheelchair.title: Voice Controlled Wheelchair
Voice Controlled Wheelchair.description: Prototyped a semi autonomous wheelchair that included obstacle detection, LiDAR, and speech commands

Quantum Computing Power Loss Minimizatio.title: Quantum Computing Power Loss Minimization Algorithm
Quantum Computing Power Loss Minimizatio.description: Developed a cloud-based quantum computing solution to minimize power loss in energy grids. The project introduced a depth-first search approach with a custom edge-weighting formula and received a National Silver Medal, the Energy Challenge Award, and the Hydrogen-Optimized Award.
